active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate how root cause analysis from an API security incident (e.g., broken authentication from OWASP API Top 10) should inform NIST SP 800-53 control enhancements. What trade-offs exist between enhanced security and operational performance? Provide evidence from real-world breaches.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education. Generate 50-100 high-quality Anki flashcards on 'Security Control Enhancement' (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > 008_Application Security > 006_API Security > 012_002_Incident Response & 005_Recovery > 005_Recovery and Remediation > Security Control Enhancement). Use university pedagogy: Bloom's progression, active learning integration. **Learning Objectives:** [Insert full list above]. **Scaffolding Layers:** [Insert full layers above, including content/sources]. **Active Learning Tie-ins:** Incorporate elements like scenario-based questions from discussion/problem-solving. **Output Format (JSON array of objects):** Each flashcard: {"front": "Question A) Opt1 B) Opt2 C) Opt3 D) Opt4", "back": "**A** (explanation with rationale, why distractors wrong, example, source, Bloom's tag: e.g., APPLY, Layer: 3)."} **Schema Rules:** [Insert full flashcard_schema above]. Ensure API-specific (OAuth, rate limiting, OWASP), incident recovery links, NIST SP 800-53 focus (families, baselines, enhancements). Vary Bloom's: 30% Remember/Understand, 30% Apply/Analyze, 40% Evaluate/Create. Distribute: 15% Layer1, etc. Citations: NIST SP 800-53 Rev.5 (https://csrc.nist.gov/pubs/sp/800/53/r5/upd1/final), OWASP API Top 10 (https://owasp.org/www-project-api-security/). Make distractors per protocol. Output only valid JSON array.
